name: Super Epic Drama Adventure Quest Run Battle
name_original: Super Epic Drama Adventure Quest Run Battle
description:
Super Epic Drama Adventure Quest Run Battle is a little game, where the most important play of your life is both a runner and a RPG ! Try to survive until the end of the play and to impress your audience !

/!\ Compo entry /!\

Controls : arrow keys to play, M to pause and resume the sound

Made in 48h with GameMaker for Ludum Dare 38 !
